title: Living analogy into the spiritual life w/ Nick Winkelman- Voices with Vervaeke
description: This is a follow up to my excellent dia logos with Nick Winkelman about his language of coaching. Here I ask Nick how his work with analogy within sports training gives him insight into spiritual and responding to the malaise of the meaning crisis.
